item.title: code fix (bug FOR-975)
item.description:
code fix by TS (fixes bug FOR-975)
:
FOR-975 Renaming tiles to panel.

item.title: code add (bug FOR-937)
item.description:
code add by TS (fixes bug FOR-937)
:
More i18n work by Sjur on Dispatcher. This patch correctly localizes menus & tabs. Thanks to Sjur Moshagen.

item.title: code fix (bug FOR-939)
item.description:
code fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-939)
:
Rename to ContractsMessages_en.xml, part of i18n changes by Sjur. Thanks to Sjur Moshagen.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Add ability to get a list of contracts provided by a plugin. For this to work the plugin name must have "plugin" within it, e.g. "org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap". Requesting ls.contracts.org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap.source.xml will return a source listing of plugins provided by the named plugin. Requesting ls.contracts.org.apache.forrest.plugin.input.doap.[FORMAT] will return a formatted output document listing all templates supplied by the identified plugin.

item.title: code update (bug FOR-935)
item.description:
code update by DC (fixes bug FOR-935)
:
i18n: Add LocaleAction action wrapper, and use the locale provided by it. Was taking the locale directly from the request instead of using the standard method in Forrest: LocaleAction. Thanks to Sjur Moshagen.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by TS :
Adding the "how tos" from the site-author to this plugin.

item.title: code add
item.description: code add by TS : Extending the dispatcher with an internal format. This internal format is our xdoc or xhtml2. The internal format will then be contacted by e.g. html contracts.

item.title: admin add
item.description:
admin add by TS :
Initial plugin code extracted from the old views plugin.

item.title: code add
item.description: code add by TS : Added first implementation of the dispatcher. Including contract bean implementation and interface; dispatcher exception and dispatcher transformers.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by GM :
Added a dispatcher glossary. Thanks to Thorsten for moving to the plugin.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by TS :
Added infos of the pattern the plugin is using.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by TS :
Updated the "how it works" section and moved it to its own site.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by TS :
Adding the dispatcher concept documentation from the site-author.

item.title: docs update (bug FOR-768)
item.description:
docs update by TS (fixes bug FOR-768)
:
Added section "linking to external css files" to howto-structurer-dsl doc. Thanks to Paul Bolger.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by TS :
Activated multiple output formats to be configured via a View.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by TS :
Added contracts and nuggets to the "view" plugins.
